IRC Logging¶

class eunomia.eunomialog.ChannelLogger(channel_name)[source]¶

Bases: eunomia.eunomialog.RolloverLogger

Handles logging of channel messages to disk.

class eunomia.eunomialog.ProposalLogger(channel_name)[source]¶

Bases: eunomia.eunomialog.RolloverLogger

Handles logging of proposals to disk.

class eunomia.eunomialog.RolloverLogger(log_type_name, log_subdirs=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Provides a basic class for logging that creates new logfiles based on date.

append(log_message)[source]¶

Appends a new line/list of lines to the log.

If log_message is a str, a newline is appended before it is written to the log.

If log_message is a list, a newline is appended to each item, then they are written to the log.

Parameters:log_message (str/list) – Either a str to append to the log, or a list of strs to append.
get_current_date()[source]¶

Gets the current UTC date.

Returns:A datetime.date object containing the current date.
Return type:datetime.date
update_current_date()[source]¶

Updates the current UTC date. Ignores if the date is current.

update_log_filename()[source]¶

Updates the current log filename, making sure to use the correct file for the date.
